biotools.summary:
Detection and reconstruction of muscle fibers from diceCT image data.
Includes functions for tracking, smoothing, cleaning, plotting and exporting muscle fibers. Also calculates basic fiber properties (e.g., length and curvature).

bioschemas.name: GoodFibes
bioschemas.summary:
Detection and reconstruction of muscle fibers from diceCT image data.
Includes functions for tracking, smoothing, cleaning, plotting and exporting muscle fibers. Also calculates basic fiber properties (e.g., length and curvature).
